org.kepler.objectmanager.cache

Class LocalRepositoryManager.LocalRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.objectmanager.cache.LocalRepositoryManager.LocalRepository
  • Enclosing class:
    LocalRepositoryManager

    public static class LocalRepositoryManager.LocalRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    A repository on the local disk. The repository may have more than one root directory.

    • Method Summary
